1:
Blessed is everyone who honors Yahweh,\q who walks in his ways.
\q
2:
What your hands provide, you will enjoy;\q you will be blessed and prosper.


\q
3:
Your wife will be like a fruitful vine\q in your house;
\q your children will be like olive plants
\q as they sit around your table.
\q
4:
Yes, indeed, the man will be blessed\q who honors Yahweh.
\q
5:
May Yahweh bless you from Zion;\q may you see the prosperity of Jerusalem all the days of your life.
\q
6: May you live to see your children's children.\q May peace be on Israel.
